thread.section_title: Panda Security opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Panda Security | www.pandasecurity.com
thread.title: P. Wong
thread.title_full: Panda Security evaluado por P. Wong

author: P. Wong
title: P. Wong
text: I've been a longtime Panda Security customer, and frankly, I wouldn't use anything else on our devices. With Panda, I don't have to worry about what I download from the internet, what websites I visit or anything else because if there are viruses or malware, I have confidence that Panda will catch them and neutralize them. I know; I've seen it in action doing just that. As long as they're in business, I will continue to be a loyal customer.
